title: Pebble Time Steel Smartwatch Review: Less Smart, More Watch
content:
In one sense, there’s very little to say about the Pebble Time Steel that hasn’t already been said about the Pebble Time I reviewed earlier in the year. Taking a leaf out of the history books of Palm, the Pebble Time Steel is the ‘upmarket metal-cased’ smartwatch that echoes the Palm V, while the Pebble Time is the slightly cheaper, plastic cased Palm III equivalent, both building on the original. 
 
from Forbes – Tech http://ift.tt/1Vv1U7s
